T02D1906:31a-8: bgyid du stsal ba de kun 'dir //
T02D1906:31a-9: thugs brtse'i rang bzhin bzod par 'os //
T02D1906:31a-10: zhes pas bzod par gsol te //
T02D1906:31a-11: yang me tog snyim par bcug nas //
T02D1906:31a-12: bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don //
T02D1906:31a-13: bsgrubs kyis bsreg bya za ba gshegs //
T02D1906:31a-14: ji lta'i dus su 'byon nas kyang //
T02D1906:31a-15: bdag las thams cad grub par mdzod /
T02D1906:31a-17: // /'di yis rdo rje can mnyes shing //
T02D1906:31a-18: ye shes me yang rab mnyes so //
T02D1906:31a-19: rgyal ba rtag pa mnyes pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-22: rta mchog bdag po mnyes 'gyur zhing //
T02D1906:31a-23: de bzhin tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1906:31a-24: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02D1906:31a-25: stobs chen rlung dang khyab 'jug dang //
T02D1906:31a-26: 'dod pa'i lha dang gshol ldan dang //
T02D1906:31a-27: zla ba nyi ma 'jigs pa'i gza' //
T02D1906:31a-28: sa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-29: lus ngan de bzhin srin po dang //
T02D1906:31a-30: chos kyi rgyal po dang ni klu ;
T02D1906:31a-31: / dri za lha min mi 'am ci //
T02D1906:31a-32: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha //
T02D1906:31a-33: 'og min du ni gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-34: gang yang rgyal po chen por gnas //
T02D1906:31a-35: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-36: 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //
T02D1906:31a-37: gang yang gnas gtsang nyer son dang //
T02D1906:31a-38: 'od zer can gyi zhing khams gnas //
T02D1906:31a-39: mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-40: gling bzhi par gnas sems can dang //
T02D1906:31a-41: gang yang khams gsum gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-42: rtsva lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa //
T02D1906:31a-43: snod kyi 'jig rten sems can dang //
T02D1906:31a-44: gang yang rab dga'i sar gnas dang //
T02D1906:31a-45: gang yang dri med pha rol son //
T02D1906:31a-47: mi g-yo'i go 'phang la gnas dang //
T02D1906:31a-48: chos sprin rjes song gang dag dang //
T02D1906:31a-49: gang dag sbyang dka' la gnas dang //
T02D1906:31a-50: ring du song bar gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31a-51: 'od byed pa la gnas pa dang //
T02D1906:31b-0: gang dag mngon gyur gnas pa @31b dang ;
T02D1906:31b-1: / legs pa'i blo gros gang gnas dang //
T02D1906:31b-2: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang //
T02D1906:31b-3: gang yang 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad //
T02D1906:31b-4: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang //
T02D1906:31b-5: bse ru lta bu rnams dang ni //
T02D1906:31b-6: yi dags dmyal ba dud 'gro dang //
T02D1906:31b-7: lha dang lha min mi rnams kun //
T02D1906:31b-8: sbyin sreg cho gas mnyes par 'gyur //
T02D1906:31b-10: nyung zhing gsal ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D1906:31b-11: rab gnas cho ga bgyis pa las //
T02D1906:31b-12: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs des //
T02D1906:31b-13: 'gro bas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog / ces pa
T02D1906:31b-14: rgya che ba'i tshig bsdus pa zhes bya ba rab
T02D1906:31b-15: tu gnas pa'i cho ga slob dpon dpal k'a tsa
T02D1906:31b-16: zhabs kyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so /
T02D1906:31b-19: dri ma med pa'i mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug / chos
T02D1906:31b-20: kyi rje chen po rgyal dbang sprul sku rin po
T02D1906:31b-21: che'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin /
T02D1906:31b-22: zha lu lo ts'a ba dge slong dharma p'a la bha dras //
T02D1906:31b-23: sa skyong dam pa dpon chen kun dga' bsod nams rin chen dbang gi rgyal po'i bdag rkyen las //
